message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your generosity. I would like to propose a price of $105 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell it to you for $115.
